column5: Hey everyone a few guys have been looking into trying to get a sanctuary set up myself being one of them and we are making some head way now we want to show how much support there is in the angling community this will be at the falls in tillsonburg and possibly part of the river during closed times to help with enforcement so guys can't say "We are just sucker fishing "with a $1000 custom float rod and reel .So if you fish for steelhead in the river or Lake Erie please sign the petition and get your buddies to do the same Thanks in advance for your support.    http://www.ipetitions.com/petition/bocsanctuary/
Done
Done and Done.  Good idea and a good cause.  Get on board people!
Done, good idea.
Done! I'm still mad at the fact the OFAH turned down the idea before..... No reason for that part of the river to not be a sanctuary!!!

I want to understand what this means better: "This petition is to show there is a need for a sanctuary on the big otter creek in the tilsonburg area to stop people fishing out of season for migratory rainbow trout."  Does this mean a complete no fishing for any species during the closed season for trout? Is there a zone where this would be applied or the entire tributary?  Is there a valid recreational fishery for any other specie during the closed trout season?  Thanks

We are trying to get the 22.9m below the water falls marked a provincial fish sanctuary (which it already is but is NOT enforced without being posted) and there is suckers and carp to be caught during the closed trout season. People are using the course fish as a excuse to fish for steelhead out of season. I have seen a tonne of guys the last few years float fishing with roe saying they are sucker fishing. The fish get jammed up at the dam and this will protect them from the honest anglers, poachers don't care but atleast we can call the tips line if they are fishing above the cable and signs. I definately don't want to shut the whole river down but the dam area needs to be a sanctuary badly.
BTW a HUGE THANKSTo all who have signed please keep them coming
